personal.name: Smarth Salaria
personal.bio: Industrial Automation/EMS Systems Engineer with over 3.5 years of experience in the solution delivery of Energy Management Systems (EMS), Power Plant Controllers (PPC), and SCADA solutions. Specialized in grid-scale  renewable and battery storage projects, with expertise spanning system architecture, control logic development, and comprehensive validation (HIL, FAT, SAT) including compliance with the Indian Grid Code.

education.degree: B.E in Computer Science & Engineering - Internet of Things

work.description: Leading and supporting the development of EMS product for the standalone bess parks and integrated solar and BESS power parks.

Contributed to the engineering and delivery of a 70 MW / 140 MWh standalone BESS project by designing EMS/SCADA system architecture, control strategies, safety interlocks, and coordinating technical documentation and vendor compliance.

Engineered, tested, and commissioned SCADA, PPC, and HEMS systems for large-scale Solar and Solar + BESS projects, integrating industrial communication protocols and automation tools to ensure grid compliance, reliable remote operation, and high-performance plant control across multiple utility-scale deployments.
